text: <@U7SL518D6> <@U26B530N6> does inline_text work with dnd modules?  could you point me to where this is documented i'm unable to find it anywhere in documentation?  thank you

Hi Trey, thank you for calling this out.
```{% module "job_title" path="@HubSpot/text", label="Job Title", value="Chief Morale Officer" %}```
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/building-blocks/modules/default-modules#one-line-of-text>
For dnd format it is:
```{% dnd_module "job_title" path="@HubSpot/text", label="Job Title", value="Chief Morale Officer" %}{% end_dnd_module %}```
Though for all intensive purposes, most of the time you’d want to use an inline text field it probably makes more sense to have that text field be within a module.

Edit: Sorry re-reading it appears I didn’t exactly answer your question. At this time It does work with default modules for text and rich text. For custom modules.

At this time inside of a custom module fields outputted with that inline text tag cannot be edited that way. That said that doesn’t mean that functionality won’t be added down the road.
